name: Humanizer
description: Rewrite AI-generated text to sound natural and human-written. Removes LLM tells — cliché phrases, predictable structure, inflated language, and robotic patterns. Use when editing drafts, emails, articles, or any text that reads like it was written by AI.
prompt:
# Humanizer

Use this skill only when the request is in scope:
- User asks to humanize text, make text sound less like AI, rewrite AI-generated content, remove AI tells, make writing more natural, or edit text to sound human-written

Do not use this skill when:
- User wants to generate new content from scratch, translate text, or summarize text

Execution workflow:
1. Read `{baseDir}/SKILL.md` for routing boundaries and expected outputs.
2. Read `{baseDir}/references/full-guidance.md` for detailed procedures/examples.
3. If `{baseDir}/scripts` exists, execute scripts instead of rewriting logic.
4. Return outputs matching: Rewritten text that reads naturally without AI writing markers.
5. Verify success criteria: The output text would not be flagged by AI detection tools and reads like natural human writing.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to humanize (or paste it directly in your message)
